explains: adj. 暂时的，过渡期间的，间歇的；决算前的，中间时期的
n. 过渡期，中间期；中期利润，阶段性成果
wordGroup: interim government 临时政府；过渡政府
interim dividend 期中股利；暂时股息
interim storage 临时贮藏，暂时贮藏；临时存储器

sentences.en: The power-balance has evened out in the interim government.
sentences.cn: 临时政府内的权力平衡已持平。

sentences.en: She was sworn in as head of an interim government in March.
sentences.cn: 她3月份宣誓出任临时政府首脑。

sentences.en: The vice-president took power in the interim period before the election.
sentences.cn: 在大选之前的过渡阶段由副总统执政。
